ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: New Everquest Cheats newsletter invitation
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks. The one message we get in the past month is a hacker..  seems no body wants to participate in this board anymore. :( If anyone wishes to begin a
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks.

The one message we get in the past month is a hacker.. seems no body wants
to participate in this board anymore. :( If anyone wishes to begin a
discussion feel free. Im still here and still playing.

Duhase lvl 46 Ranger

-----Original Message-----
From: Avron [mailto:avron@...]
Sent: Friday, July 28, 2000 1:15 PM
To: EverQuest@egroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Re: New Everquest Cheats newsletter invitation


I do NOT want to see any more emails promoting cheats and hacks for
EverQuest! And for your information, Craig, I have sent your name and
email address along with a copy of this vile message to Verant.
Perhaps they can find your account and ban your sorry excuse for a
player.

- Admin -



--- In EverQuest@egroups.com, "Craig Baldwin" <craigba@v...> wrote:
> If you want Everquest Cheats/Bugs/Secrets and Hacking newsletter
> emailed to you you are invited to join a new egroup:
>
> http://www.egroups.com/group/EQ-Everquest-Cheats-Bugs-Secrets
>
> Emails are usually about once per week with various cheats and
> spolier info
>
> Thanks




Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
